overview:
Marc is an entrepreneur and a consultant with more than 15 years management experience, including experience in starting and managing businesses in various fields.

Marc is the founder of Entrepreneur Commons, a not-for-profit organization with a global footprint (17 chapters in 13 cities around the world) providing peer-support to entrepreneurs. Marc is also principal at Dangeard Group, managing partner at Melcion Chassagne & Cie, and investment advisor representative for Anselme Capital.

Since 2006 Marc has worked closely with approximately 30 High Tech startups (Software, Internet), in fields such as Enterprise 2.0, Web 2.0, Social Networking, Internet Security, Blogosphere Relationship Management, P2P Video streaming, etc… Marc has also worked for Oracle for 8 years, where he managed eCommerce products such as iStore and iSupport, as well as other Software As a Service (SaaS) applications. As part of this work, Marc led projects spanning across the Oracle China Development Center (with teams in Beijing, Shenzhen and Singapore) and the US development team.

Marc is a Graduate from HEC (Hautes Etudes Commerciales â€“ http://www.hec.edu), a top MBA in Europe, and from SupAero (Ecole Nationale de l’Aeronautique et de l’Espace â€“ http://www.supaero.fr/en/), the top aeronautical engineering school in France.
